title: IbmWchSdk Generate Contributions Schema
description: Generates sites-next page contributions from the build output of an Angular build.

data.description: The path to the directory of the WCH data artifacts.

project.description: Name of the project. If missing the command uses the default project.

configuration.description: The configuration to generate the contributions for. This is a potentially comma separated list, defaults to 'production'.

mode.description: The contribution mode, a comma separated list modes. The mode names must be 'always', 'live' or 'preview'.

tag.description: A comma separated list of tags.

package.description: If set to true, generate an npm descriptor for the resources, defaults to false.

license.description: License information used to produce the NPM package, defaults to MIT.
